<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfs">vfs</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">FileSystem</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is a utility class used to parse user-provided text files with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &quot;special case lists&quot; for code sanitizers. Such files are used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// define an &quot;ABI list&quot; for DataFlowSanitizer and allow/exclusion lists for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sanitizers like AddressSanitizer or UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Empty lines and lines starting with &quot;#&quot; are ignored. Sections are defined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// using a &#39;&#91;section&#95;name&#93;&#39; header and can be used to specify sanitizers the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// entries below it apply to. Section names are globs, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// entries without a section header match all sections (e.g. an &#39;&#91;&#42;&#93;&#39; header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is assumed.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The remaining lines should have the form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   prefix:glob&#95;pattern&#91;=category&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If category is not specified, it is assumed to be empty string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Definitions of &quot;prefix&quot; and &quot;category&quot; are sanitizer-specific. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sanitizer exclusion support prefixes &quot;src&quot;, &quot;mainfile&quot;, &quot;fun&quot; and &quot;global&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &quot;glob&#95;pattern&quot; defines source files, main files, functions or globals which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// shouldn&#39;t be instrumented.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Examples of categories:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &quot;functional&quot;: used in DFSan to list functions with pure functional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                 semantics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &quot;init&quot;: used in ASan exclusion list to disable initialization-order bugs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           detection for certain globals or source files.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Full special case list file example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ---</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#91;address&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// # Excluded items:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fun:&#42;&#95;ZN4base6subtle&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// global:&#42;global&#95;with&#95;bad&#95;access&#95;or&#95;initialization&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// global:&#42;global&#95;with&#95;initialization&#95;issues&#42;=init</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// type:&#42;Namespace::ClassName&#42;=init</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// src:file&#95;with&#95;tricky&#95;code.cc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// src:ignore-global-initializers-issues.cc=init</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// mainfile:main&#95;file.cc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#91;dataflow&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// # Functions with pure functional semantics:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fun:cos=functional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fun:sin=functional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ---</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a96b799c5b8a9865e51dfb44b0c8498a1">SpecialCaseList</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 0 and writes an error message to string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;SpecialCaseList&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">         std::string &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Parses the special case list from a memory buffer. On failure, returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 0 and writes an error message to string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;SpecialCaseList&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a86af60e718692f43fa3a22b94bbbc4a8">create</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/mb">MB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 std::string &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Parses the special case list entries from files. On failure, reports a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// fatal error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;SpecialCaseList&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a6c0343ae2b29d3a9882c0cfc4bee8c03">createOrDie</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;std::string&gt; &amp;Paths, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">llvm::vfs::FileSystem</a> &amp;FS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a973602c10952d42c1862f2e745280ec8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specialcaselist/#a973602c10952d42c1862f2e745280ec8">~SpecialCaseList</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true, if special case list contains a line</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   @Prefix:&lt;E&gt;=@Category</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Represents a set of globs and their line numbers</span></CodeLine>
